Third-party libraries in this folder
=====================================

Simple DataTables
-----------------
Download URL: https://github.com/fiduswriter/Simple-DataTables
Version: 3.2.0
License: LGPL-3.0
Files: simple-datatables.js, style.css

To update:
1. Download the latest release from https://github.com/fiduswriter/Simple-DataTables/releases
2. Replace simple-datatables.js and style.css with the new versions
3. Update version number in thirdpartylibs.xml
